revision.text: {{MetaRC |MetaRCGroup=FramesRelatedAtHigherLevelByCM |MetaRCDescription=The target frame is a subcase descendent of a frame which is made use of by a frame which is a subcase descendant of the target frame of a CM. The source frame is a subcase descendant of the source frame of a CM. |MetaRCComments=getcmsfromframesmed |MetaRCScore=0.4 |MetaRCQueryCode=SELECT DISTINCT ?cm WHERE { ?tframe rdf:type mo:Frame . ?sframe rdf:type mo:Frame . ?cm mo:hasTargetFrame ?tgframe . ?cm mo:hasSourceFrame ?isframe . ?itframe mo:makesUseOfFrame ?iitframe . ?tframe mo:isSubcaseOfFrame* ?iitframe . ?itframe mo:isSubcaseOfFrame* ?tgframe . ?sframe mo:isSubcaseOfFrame* ?isframe } }}
